definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
(bird species of China) blossom-headed parakeet (Psittacula roseata)

sentences.english: The most distinguishing feature of this plant is its flower-head.
sentences.chinese: 這種植物的最顯着特點是它的花頭。

sentences.english: The edible, immature flower head of this plant.
sentences.chinese: 洋薊花頭這種植物的可食用的，未成熟的花頭。

sentences.english: The edible, immature flower head of this plant.
sentences.chinese: 洋薊花頭這種植物的可食用的，未成熟的花頭。

sentences.english: Each plant will produce only one of these magnificent flower-heads in a season.
sentences.chinese: 每個工廠將只生產這些宏偉的花頭中的一個賽季。

definition: weight/pendant/same as 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]/ballad singing accompanied by a 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]
to be an irksome presence (i.e. sth or sb one wishes were not there)
